name: Espresso Shot
description: A developer's life force derives solely from caffeine

name: Stack Overflow
description: Copy and paste someone else's code

name: Developer Rage
description: Throw your keyboard dealing damage to yourself and your boss
shopDescription: -5 to player health, -10 to boss health

name: Software Update
description: Install the newest update for your character

name: Alt F4
description: Immediatley close your application. Player and boss health reset.

name: Merge Conflict
description: Merge failed. Subtract 20 health from the player and boss
codeSnippet: Please commit your changes or stash them before you merge. Aborting

name: C⅏rrupt Ⅎil∃s
description: The bosses opens a corrupt file and loses 8 health

name: Office Hours
description: Stay late and get some extra help. Add 10 to your health and damage the boss for 3
